definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="120" y="98"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">attribute @s minecraft:generic.movement_speed modifier remove 06be9690-876a-468f-9d10-25eb7c432664</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_iscreative"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">kill the block display which was caused by the freeze effect</comment><value name="command"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">kill @e[type=minecraft:block_display,nbt={ForgeData:{freeze_effect:1b, frozen_entity:"</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_get_uuid"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">"}}]</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_set_ticks_frozen"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="ticksfrozen"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">55</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
